snippet: Thibaut Pinot gave France its first stage victory in the crash-plagued Tour de France, while Samuel Sánchez withdrew after a crash in which he broke his right hand and injured his left shoulder.
abstract: French cyclist Thibaut Pinot wins the eighth stage of the Tour de France bicycle race, giving France its first stage victory; the defending Olympic champion Samuel Sanchez withdraws after breaking his right hand and injuring his left shoulder in a crash; this year's race has already been the most dangerous in decades, with at least 20 riders pulling out because of crashes.
lead_paragraph: Thibaut Pinot gave France its first stage victory in the crash-plagued Tour de France, while Samuel Sánchez withdrew after a crash in which he broke his right hand and injured his left shoulder.

headline.seo: Tour de France — Thibaut Pinot Wins Stage
headline.main: Olympic Winner Crashes and May Miss London
headline.print_headline: Olympic Winner Crashes and May Miss London
